text: Cole Michael Bennett (born May 14, 1996) is an American director. He started the Lyrical Lemonade in 2013. == Early life == Cole Bennett was born on May 14, 1996, in Plano, Illinois. He went to Plano High School. He dropped out of DePaul University to focus on his career in hip hop music. == Lyrical Lemonade == Bennett started Lyrical Lemonade as a blog and YouTube channel when he was a high school student in Plano, Illinois. His channel also had live show recaps, documentaries and interviews. In May 2018, he directed the music video for Juice Wrld's "Lucid Dreams", which hit number 2 on the Billboard Hot 100. As of December 1, 2023, the video has surpassed 940 million views on YouTube. Through Lyrical Lemonade, he has worked with mainstream figures in hip hop such as J. Cole, Wiz Khalifa, Kanye West, and Eminem. == Accolades == Award ceremony Year Category Nominated work Result BET Hip Hop Awards 2020 Video Director of the Year Himself 2021 Streamy Awards 2019 Directing Lyrical Lemonade 2020 Cinematography 2022 == References == Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:American bloggers Category:Movie directors from Illinois
title: Cole Bennett
